title: Kourtney Kardashian suits up in leather jacket and trousers as she hugs BFF Simon Huck
text:
He's been her steadfast companion for the last decade.

And Kourtney Kardashian looked delighted to catch up with her BFF Simon Huck on Wednesday night.

The reality star embraced the 36-year-old Command Entertainment Group owner, as the two left Kanye West's Jesus Is King listening concert at the Forum in Inglewood.

Night out: Kourtney Kardashian suits up in leather jacket and trousers for Kanye West's Jesus Is King listening concert at the Forum in Inglewood

For her night out, Kourtney wore an all leather look, teaming an oversized leather jacket with tapers black trousers.

The mother-of-three has known Simon as far back as 2009 and he even guest-starred in three episodes of KUWTK and three episodes of spin-off Kourtney & Kim Take Miami.

This summer he joined Kourtney and her kids in Portofino for their Italian vacation, posting multiple pictures to social media.

BFFs! The reality star gave BFF Simon Huck a hug goodbye after the show

But while he is Kourtney's close friend, Huck is no romantic interest - he has a ripped boyfriend called Phil Riportella, who he describes on on Instagram as 'my partner in crime whom I love so very much'.

Currently single, Kardashian has three children - son Mason, nine; daughter Penelope, seven; and son Reign, four - with Talentless clothing CEO Scott Disick, whom she split with in 2015.

The children just returned from armenia, where their joined Kourtney, their aunt Kim, and cousins North, Saint, Chicago and Psalm on a trip to their ancestral homeland.
description: The reality star embraced the 36-year-old Command Entertainment Group owner, as the two left Kanye West 's Jesus Is King listening concert at the Forum in Inglewood.
